BatchParseJobConfig.title: BatchParseJobConfig
BatchParseJobConfig.description:
Generic parse job configuration for batch processing.

This model contains the parsing configuration that applies to all files
in a batch, but excludes file-specific fields like file_name, file_id, etc.
Those file-specific fields are populated from DirectoryFile data when
creating individual ParseJobRecordCreate instances for each file.

The fields in this model should be generic settings that apply uniformly
to all files being processed in the batch.

partitions.title: Partitions
partitions.description: The partitions for this execution. Used for determining where to save job output.

parameters.description: The generic parse configuration for all files in the batch.

session_id.title: Session Id
session_id.description: The upstream request ID that created this job. Used for tracking the job across services.

correlation_id.title: Correlation Id
correlation_id.description: The correlation ID for this job. Used for tracking the job across services.

parent_job_execution_id.title: Parent Job Execution Id
parent_job_execution_id.description: The ID of the parent job execution.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The ID of the user that created this job

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID of the project this job belongs to.

webhook_url.title: Webhook Url
webhook_url.description: The URL that needs to be called at the end of the parsing job.

BatchParseJobRecordCreate.title: BatchParseJobRecordCreate
BatchParseJobRecordCreate.description:
Batch-specific parse job record for batch processing.

This model contains the metadata and configuration for a batch parse job,
but excludes file-specific information. It's used as input to the batch
parent workflow and combined with DirectoryFile data to create full
ParseJobRecordCreate instances for each file.

Attributes:
    job_name: Must be PARSE_RAW_FILE
    partitions: Partitions for job output location
    parameters: Generic parse configuration (BatchParseJobConfig)
    session_id: Upstream request ID for tracking
    correlation_id: Correlation ID for cross-service tracking
    parent_job_execution_id: Parent job execution ID if nested
    user_id: User who created the job
    project_id: Project this job belongs to
    webhook_url: Optional webhook URL for job completion notifications

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: The modelId of the Bedrock model to use.

embed_batch_size.title: Embed Batch Size
embed_batch_size.description: The batch size for embedding calls.

num_workers.title: Num Workers
num_workers.description: The number of workers to use for async embedding calls.

profile_name.title: Profile Name
profile_name.description: The name of aws profile to use. If not given, then the default profile is used.

aws_access_key_id.title: Aws Access Key Id
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key ID to use

aws_secret_access_key.title: Aws Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key to use

region_name.title: Region Name
region_name.description: AWS region name to use. Uses region configured in AWS CLI if not passed

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: The maximum number of API retries.

timeout.title: Timeout
